definition: fire/urgent/ammunition/fiery or flaming/internal heat (Chinese medicine)/hot (popular)/classifier for military units (old)/Kangxi radical 86
lit. burn your hand, feel the heat (idiom)/fig. arrogance of the powerful/a mighty figure no-one dares approach/hot (exciting or in favor)
to scorch/(of the sun) to beat down on
to scorch/to burn to charcoal/sick with worry
to be enlightened by direct contact with sb

sentences.english: The drug concentration of Zhi Gancao Decoction contained serum was examined by serologic pharmacological test.
sentences.chinese: 血清药理学法确定血清中炙甘草汤含药浓度。

sentences.english: China can also launch the improved version of the "Sunburn."
sentences.chinese: 也可以发射中国改进版的“日炙”。

sentences.english: The effects of wine fried Danshen in activating blood and eleminating stasis were studied.
sentences.chinese: 探讨酒炙对丹参活血祛瘀作用的影响。

sentences.english: He lit a fire, spitted a leg of mutton.
sentences.chinese: 他点燃了一堆火，用炙叉叉住一条羊腿。

sentences.english: Objective To optimize the processing technology of Radix Achyranthis Bidentatae prepared with salt.
sentences.chinese: 目的筛选盐炙怀牛膝的最佳炮制工艺。

sentences.english: Objective To study the effect of Houpu and Houpu processed by Ginger juice on gastrointestinal motor function.
sentences.chinese: 目的考察厚朴姜炙前后对小鼠胃排空机能的影响。

sentences.english: It indicated that Modified Prepared Gancao Decoction had good effects in treating viral myocarditis.
sentences.chinese: 提示炙甘草汤加味治疗病毒性心肌炎有较好疗效。

sentences.english: Objective To evaluate the therapeutic effects of modified Roast Radix Glycyrrhizae Decoction on patients with premature ventricular complexes(PVCs).
sentences.chinese: 目的观察加味炙甘草汤治疗室性早搏的临床疗效。

sentences.english: Objective To optimize the technology of processing Radix cyathulae.
sentences.chinese: 目的优选川牛膝的酒炙工艺。

definition: to dry over a fire/to bake
sappan wood (Caesalpinia sappan), used in Chinese medicine
ardent/intense/fierce/stern/upright/to give one's life for a noble cause/exploits/achievements
